description:
Human Element Real Estate is a dynamic brokerage based in Santa Monica, dedicated to providing exceptional service through authentic connections and white-glove service. With decades of experience, our team focuses on building community and delivering unparalleled client satisfaction through innovative solutions and collaborative efforts.

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Operations Manager/Office Assistant to support Keri, one of the owners of Human Element Real Estate. This role is crucial in ensuring the smooth operation of our office and supporting the day-to-day activities of the leadership team

Compensation: $80,000 - $120,000
